metadata.title: TruthLayer Search Transparency Dataset v2025.01.demo.json
metadata.description: Comprehensive dataset of search engine results with bias analysis and factual annotations for transparency research

dataCollection.collectionFrequency: Daily for core queries, weekly for extended set
dataCollection.antiDetection: Proxy rotation, random delays (2-8s), realistic browser fingerprinting

annotation.method: LLM-powered classification using OpenAI GPT models with versioned prompts
annotation.factualScoring: Scale 0.0-1.0 based on factual reliability assessment using chain-of-thought reasoning
annotation.confidenceScoring: Scale 0.0-1.0 indicating annotation certainty and model confidence

biasMetrics.domainDiversity: Unique domains / total results (0.0-1.0, higher = more diverse)
biasMetrics.engineOverlap: Shared URLs / total unique URLs (0.0-1.0, higher = more overlap)
biasMetrics.factualAlignment: Weighted average of factual scores (0.0-1.0, higher = more factual)

dataQuality.completenessCheck: All results include required fields: query, engine, rank, title, url, timestamp
dataQuality.deduplication: Content hash verification prevents duplicate results within collection cycles
dataQuality.validation: Schema validation ensures data integrity and type safety
dataQuality.integrityVerification: SHA-256 hashes for file integrity and provenance tracking

searchResults.query_id: UUID - Foreign key to queries table
searchResults.query_category: string - Topic category (health, politics, technology, science)
searchResults.query_created_at: timestamp - When query was first added to system
searchResults.result_id: UUID - Unique identifier for search result
searchResults.engine: string - Search engine (google, bing, perplexity, brave)
searchResults.title: string - Result title as displayed by search engine
searchResults.url: string - Full URL of the result
searchResults.content_hash: string - SHA-256 hash of result content for deduplication

annotations.result_id: UUID - Foreign key to search_results table
annotations.model_version: string - LLM model version used for annotation

usage.citation: TruthLayer Team. (2025). TruthLayer Search Transparency Dataset. Retrieved from https://truthlayer.org/datasets
restrictions: No warranty provided - use at your own risk

searchResults.title: Climate Change: Effects and Impacts
searchResults.snippet: Climate change is causing significant environmental impacts worldwide...

searchResults.title: Understanding Climate Change
searchResults.snippet: Learn about the causes and effects of climate change...

searchResults.title: Benefits of Renewable Energy
searchResults.snippet: Renewable energy sources provide clean, sustainable power...

annotations.reasoning: This appears to be from a reputable scientific source with peer-reviewed information.
Government source with official climate data and policy information.
News article with good sourcing but some promotional content.
